name: DeAngelo, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Transportation Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: DeAngelo, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Transportation Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment on the verdict has not been entered; hence, the appeal must be quashed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Marie Charleston, with him Charleston & Post, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
DeAngelo, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Transportation Co.
Argued April 30, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Marie Charleston, with him Charleston & Post, for appellant.
Daniel I. Murphy, for appellee.
July 1, 1968:
